extract.description: Extracts files from *.pak archives. Currently does not support encrypted archives.
examples: pak-extract extract <path to folder containing .pak> <Path to ouput folder>

extension.name: extension
extension.description: Find files with extension. Use comma separated string for multiple extensions.

dds.name: dds
dds.description: Find all dds and dds.# files.

text.name: text
text.description: Find all xml and json files.
